Translations.Text: Z yikhnimy ochamy pidkorene, prynyzhennya nakryye yikh. Vony buly zaprosheni shchob vpasty prostrate koly vony vmily vsi ta
Tomu, dozvolenyy Meni mayutʹ spravu z tsi khto vidkhylyayutʹ tse Hadith; my pryvedemo yikh na zvidky vony nikoly ne spryymutʹ
ya dam yim dosytʹ kanat; Miy zamyshlyayuchyy formidable
vy prosyte yikh dlya hroshey, takym chynom vony burdened shtrafom
vony znayutʹ maybutnye? Vony tse zapysalo
Vy budete steadfastly persevere u vykonuyuchykh komandakh vashoho Lorda. Ne vyhlyadayte yak (Jonah) khto zaklykav z vnutrishnosti ryba
Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya yoho charivnosti Lorda, vin by ejected u pustelyu yak hrishnyk
Ale yoho Lord blahoslovlyav yoho, ta zroblenoho yomu spravedlyvomu
Tsey khto disbelieved pokaz yikhniy ridicule u yikhnikh ochakh koly vony chuyutʹ povidomlennya ta kazhutʹ, "Vin ye bozhevilʹnyy
Yak dlya Thamoud, vony buly vynyshcheni spustoshlyvyy (tremtinnya)
Yak dlya `aad, vony buly vynyshcheni napolehlyvym, nasylʹnytsʹkym shtormom
Vin rozv'yazav tse na nykh dlya semy nochi ta vosʹmy dniv, nasylʹnytsʹko. Vy mohly pobachyty lyudey shpurnuly navkolo lyubyte decayed korpusy palʹmy
vy Mozhete znayty budʹ-yakyy slid z nykh
